input_pointcloud_frame.description: Frame id of the TF2 frame the input pointcloud is in

input_frame.description: Frame id of the TF2 frame the crop box is defined in

output_frame.description: Frame id of the TF2 frame to output the filtered cloud in

max_queue_size.description: Maximum queue size of the pointcloud subscription

min_x.description: Minimum x value of the crop box

min_y.description: Minimum y value of the crop box

min_z.description: Minimum z value of the crop box

max_x.description: Maximum x value of the crop box

max_y.description: Maximum y value of the crop box

max_z.description: Maximum z value of the crop box

negative.description: If true, points inside the box are removed, otherwise points outside the box are removed.
